stories.title: Scraping SEC
stories.description: Narrative walkthrough of how Codex CLI built an SEC scraper in one-shot, recovering from errors, handling messy data, and with self-critique.

stories.title: Bollywood Box Office Champions
stories.description: Interactive, inflation-adjusted bubble chart of the top-grossing Hindi films from 1994 to 2024, spotlighting record-setting blockbusters.

stories.title: Google Search Topic Trends
stories.description: Categorized every Google Search since Jan 2021 into 50 topics. It's mostly tech, AI, and geo-cultural. I also need to allocate more time to testing, databases, and other 'spiky' topics.

stories.title: ChatGPT vs Google
stories.description: How my ChatGPT usage has grown at the expense of Google usage. Google is only 60% of my usage, and far lower in engagement

stories.title: My Vipassana Experience
stories.description: A manually LLM-generated comic story book about my 10-day Vipassana meditation program, generated purely using a set of simple captions, via ChatGPT

stories.title: My Vipassana Experience
stories.description: A programmatically LLM-generated comic story book about my 10-day Vipassana meditation program, generated purely using a set of simple captions, via Gemini 2.0 Flash

stories.title: ChatGPT Topic Trends
stories.description: Categorized the 6,000 ChatGPT conversations I've had in the last 2 years to understand what topics I discuss the most. It's mostly tech, AI, reading/writing, and some daily-life stuff.

stories.title: Indian High Courts Judgment Analysis
stories.description: Comprehensive analysis of 16M judgments from 25 Indian High Courts. Reveals court efficiency disparities, seasonal justice patterns, and systematic UAPA bail delays with 120+ day gaps between hearings.

stories.title: LLM Agents in Software: Code vs Domain
stories.description: Coding agents reduce the effort of coding. Does that mean domain will matter more? Here's an LLM-generated animation showing my perspective that domain agents will level the field.

stories.title: Deep Research Horoscope Contradictions
stories.description: Asked Gemini Deep Research to read Sagittarius horoscope for 16 June 2025 and list contradictions from various Indian media sources.

stories.title: Employment Growth Since 1980
stories.description: Some US sectors like Scenic Transportation & Healthcare grew over 2X while Rail & Central Banks shrank to 40-80% of original size. Analysis using BLS CES data.

stories.title: Weight Journey 2025
stories.description: Lost 22 kg in 22 weeks through intermittent fasting. Skipped lunch, no snacks, no extra exercise.
